special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
When Into Turntimber enters, create three 1/1 green Plant creature tokens.
[b]2 Defense[/b] Stage 2
Creatures you control have trample.
[b]Defeated[/b] [b]Stage 3[/b]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control’s base power becomes 7 until end of turn.
